countryAttributes.name: attributes
countryAttributes.description: Describes the fields to include in the response (other than the required ones). Delimit the fields with a comma if there are multiple. If this parameter is omitted, all fields will be returned.

caseStatsAttributes.name: attributes
caseStatsAttributes.description: Describes the fields to include in the response (other than the required ones). Delimit the fields with a comma if there are multiple. If this parameter is omitted, all fields will be returned.

riskFactorStatsAttributes.name: attributes
riskFactorStatsAttributes.description: Describes the fields to include in the response (other than the required ones). Delimit the fields with a comma if there are multiple. If this parameter is omitted, all fields will be returned.

countryID.name: identifier
countryID.description: Unique identifier which is used to select data by country. Valid identifiers include alpha codes and the primary country name.
